verses.verse: "As for you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> a sharp <S%H2299><s%> sword; <S%H2719><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> and use <S%H5674><s%> it [as] a barber's razor <S%H8593><s%> on your head <S%H7218><s%> and beard. <S%H2206><s%> Then take <S%H3947><s%> scales <S%H3976><s%> for weighing <S%H4948><s%> and divide <S%H2505><s%> the hair.

"One <S%H7992><s%> third <S%H7992><s%> you shall burn <S%H1197><s%> in the fire <S%H217><s%> at the center <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> when the days <S%H3117><s%> of the siege <S%H4692><s%> are completed. <S%H4390><s%> Then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H7992><s%> third <S%H7992><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> [it] with the sword <S%H2719><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the city, and one <S%H7992><s%> third <S%H7992><s%> you shall scatter <S%H2219><s%> to the wind; <S%H7307><s%> and I will unsheathe <S%H9553><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them.
"Take <S%H3947><s%> also a few <S%H4592><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%> from them and bind <S%H6696><s%> them in the edges <S%H3671><s%> of your [robes.]

"And take <S%H3947><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of them and throw <S%H7993><s%> them into the fire, <S%H784><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> them in the fire; <S%H784><s%> from it a fire <S%H784><s%> will spread <S%H3318><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'This <S%H384><s%> is Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> I have set <S%H7760><s%> her at the center <S%H8432><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> with lands <S%H776><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> her.

'But she has rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H854><s%> My ordinances <S%H4941><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> wickedly <S%H7564><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> and against <S%H854><s%> My statutes <S%H2708><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the lands <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> her; for they have rejected <S%H3988><s%> My ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and have not walked <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes. <S%H2708><s%>'

"Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Because <S%H3282><s%> you have more <S%H4480><s%> turmoil <S%H9098><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> you, and have not walked <S%H1980><s%> in My statutes, <S%H2708><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> observed <S%H6213><s%> My ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> observed <S%H6213><s%> the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> you,'

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I, even <S%H1571><s%> I, am against <S%H5921><s%> you, and I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

'And because <S%H3282><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> among you what <S%H834><s%> I have not done, <S%H6213><s%> and the like <S%H3644><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I will never <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> again. <S%H5750><s%>

'Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> fathers will eat <S%H1><s%> [their] sons <S%H398><s%> among <S%H1121><s%> you, and sons <S%H8432><s%> will eat <S%H1121><s%> their fathers; for I will execute <S%H398><s%> judgments <S%H1><s%> on you, and scatter <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H8201><s%> your remnant <S%H2219><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> wind. <S%H7611><s%>

'So <S%H3651><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'surely, <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> you have defiled <S%H2930><s%> My sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your detestable <S%H8251><s%> idols <S%H8251><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> therefore I will also <S%H1571><s%> withdraw, <S%H1639><s%> and My eye <S%H5869><s%> shall have <S%H2347><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> and I will not spare. <S%H2550><s%>

'One <S%H7992><s%> third <S%H7992><s%> of you will die <S%H4191><s%> by plague <S%H1698><s%> or be consumed <S%H3615><s%> by famine <S%H7458><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, one <S%H7992><s%> third <S%H7992><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> you, and one <S%H7992><s%> third <S%H7992><s%> I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> and I will unsheathe <S%H9553><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them.

'Thus My anger <S%H639><s%> will be spent, <S%H3615><s%> and I will satisfy <S%H5117><s%> My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them, and I shall be appeased; <S%H5162><s%> then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in My zeal <S%H7068><s%> when I have spent <S%H3615><s%> My wrath <S%H2534><s%> upon them.

'Moreover, I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a desolation <S%H2723><s%> and a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> you, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> who pass <S%H5674><s%> by.

'So it will be a reproach, <S%H2781><s%> a reviling, <S%H1422><s%> a warning <S%H4148><s%> and an object <S%H4923><s%> of horror <S%H4923><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> who <S%H834><s%> surround <S%H5439><s%> you, when I execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> against you in anger, <S%H639><s%> wrath, <S%H2534><s%> and raging <S%H2534><s%> rebukes. <S%H9640><s%> I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

'When I send <S%H7971><s%> against them the deadly <S%H7451><s%> arrows <S%H2671><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were for the destruction <S%H7843><s%> of those whom <S%H834><s%> I shall send <S%H7971><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> you, then I shall also intensify <S%H3254><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> upon you, and break <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread. <S%H3899><s%>

'Moreover, I will send <S%H7971><s%> on you famine <S%H7458><s%> and wild <S%H7451><s%> beasts, <S%H9130><s%> and they will bereave <S%H7921><s%> you of children; <S%H7921><s%> plague <S%H1698><s%> and bloodshed <S%H1818><s%> also will pass <S%H5674><s%> through you, and I will bring <S%H935><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> on you.
